product_description: Mammut's Haute Route Helmet can do it all. Whether we're chasing backcountry powder, scaling rockfaces, or pedaling on tarmac, this helmet is certified to boost our safety. No matter how we're getting our adrenaline fix, the internal air channels are keeping us chill, while the elastic straps offer to secure our goggles or headlamp. On long approaches to alpine routes, we appreciate the hybrid construction keeping the weight low without sacrificing durability. And on cold midwinter resort days, we're thankful for the included beanie that slips comfortably inside and the large front vents that keep our goggles from fogging up.

name: PETZL Vertex Vent
short_description: ADJUSTABLE VENTILATION: Features ventilation holes with sliding shutters that allow you to adjust the airflow while wearing the helmet, perfect for hot environments.

DUAL CHINSTRAP: The innovative adjustable chinstrap allows you to switch between high strength for work at height (limiting risk of loss) and lower strength for ground work (limiting risk of strangulation).
SUPERIOR COMFORT: Equipped with a six-point textile suspension that conforms to the shape of the head and the FLIP&FIT system that folds the headband into the shell for storage.
CENTERFIT ADJUSTMENT: Two side adjustment wheels allow you to easily center the helmet on your head for a stable, secure fit, even while wearing gloves.
MODULAR ACCESSORIES: Fully compatible with Petzl accessories including PIXA/DUO headlamps, VIZIR face shields, and standard hearing protection (via side slots).
product_description: The Petzl VERTEX VENT is a comfortable, ventilated safety helmet designed for work at height and rescue professionals. This helmet features a six-point textile suspension and CENTERFIT/FLIP&FIT systems that ensure the helmet fits securely and centers perfectly on the head. The adjustable-strength DUAL chinstrap allows the user to switch between "Ground" mode (release <25kg, EN 397) and "Height" mode (retention > 50kg, EN 12492). Distinct from the standard model, the VERTEX VENT features adjustable ventilation holes with sliding shutters to allow airflow through the helmet. It includes slots for integrating a Petzl headlamp, hearing protection, and face shields. Specifications: Certifications: ANSI Z89.1 Type I Class C, CE EN 397, EN 12492 Chinstrap: DUAL (Adjustable Strength) Shell: Ventilated (Class C - No Electrical Protection) Size: 53-63 cm (One Size) Warranty: 3 Years

name: Kailas Rock Climbing Helmet Men Mountaineering Hiking Caving Helmet Adults Search Rescue Helmet Women Work Safety Helmet Black
short_description: Ultra-lightweight Design: The Kailas AIRO helmet is made of high-strength lightweight materials, weighing as light as a feather, allowing you to focus on enjoying the climbing experience without feeling burdened.

Powerful Impact Resistance: The helmet features cushioning materials and a structural design that effectively absorbs and disperses impact forces, protecting the head from collisions and falls. Whether it's rock climbing or mountaineering, it provides reliable safety protection.

Excellent Ventilation System: The Kailas AIRO helmet is designed with multiple vents and channels to promote airflow, effectively reducing the temperature and humidity inside the helmet, keeping you cool and comfortable during intense activities.

Adjustable Suspension System: The helmet is equipped with an adjustable suspension system that can be customized based on individual head size and preferences, ensuring a proper fit and stability. No matter your head size, you can find the most comfortable wearing style.

Durable and Easy to Clean: The helmet's shell is made of abrasion-resistant and scratch-resistant materials, capable of withstanding impacts and scratches. Additionally, the shell is easy to clean, simply wipe it with a damp cloth to maintain cleanliness and tidiness.
product_description: The Kailas AIRO ultra-light climbing helmet is a high-performance helmet designed specifically for rock climbing and mountaineering enthusiasts. It utilizes advanced materials and manufacturing techniques, offering features such as lightweight construction, powerful impact resistance, excellent ventilation, adjustable suspension system, and durability for easy cleaning. It provides reliable protection and a comfortable fit for climbers and mountaineers. Moreover, the AIRO ultra-light climbing helmet is a brand-new one-piece EPP foam molded helmet that conforms to the head circumference requirements of Asian individuals. The carbon fiber top cover provides excellent impact resistance and shock absorption, meeting the climbers' ultimate pursuit of safety and weight reduction.

short_description: Comfortable Fit: Work Safety Helmet with adjustable 6-point suspension system for superior shock absorption and head protection. Humanized Design: This safety helmet features an innovative design with multiple adjustment mechanisms, allowing workers to easily modify the fit and depth of the helmet shell even while wearing gloves. The vented design with sliding controls adapts to different weather conditions, enhancing breathability and comfort

Quality Material: Made from high-strength ABS material, this lightweight yet impact-resistant safety helmet is designed to provide reliable protection against falling objects, impacts, and bumps, making it ideal for high-risk working environments

Compliant with: Meets ANSI Z89.1-2014 Type I Class C standards, ensuring industry safety for a wide range of applications, including construction, industrial work, rescue, tree climbing, and scaffolding

Enhanced Versatility: Accessory slots support a variety of add-ons such as ear muffs, clear or tinted safety visors, and headlamps. Hi-Viz reflective elements on the front, rear, and sides improve visibility in low-light environments, offering full head protection for maximum workplace safety
product_description: This robust yet lightweight construction helmet boasts an adjustable 6-point suspension system that cushions impacts and ensures a balanced fit. A Y-type chin strap with a molded chin cup keeps the helmet secure, while the 5363 cm size range accommodates most adults comfortably throughout long shifts. Its vented shell and sliding airflow controls adapt to varying temperatures. Crafted from tough, high-impact ABS, this helmet shields against falling debris and workplace hazards without adding excessive weight. Compliant with ANSI/ISEA Z89.1-2014 Type I, Class C standards, it offers reliable protection in demanding environments. It includes accessory slots for easy attachment of additional safety gear and Hi-Viz reflective stripes for enhanced workplace visibility.
